languages.text: "Мон-кай так любят заигрывать с силами, что им неподвластны, во имя продления своего жалкого века. Это... я бы сказал, по-своему трогательно".
"Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай так любят заигрывать с силами, что им неподвластны, во имя продления своего жалкого века. Это... я бы сказал, по-своему трогательно".

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful lifespan. I'd say it's... kind of touching."
"The mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful lifespan. I'd say it's... kind of touching."
"The mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I'd say it's... kind of touching."

"Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."
"Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."

languages.text: “猴子们真的很喜欢玩弄他们根本无法控制的力量，而这一切不过是为了延续他们可悲的寿命。我甚至觉得这一点……很令人触动，从某种意义上而言。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."

traits.locale_text: “猴子们真的很喜欢玩弄他们根本无法控制的力量，而这一切不过是为了延续他们可悲的寿命。我甚至觉得这一点……很令人触动，从某种意义上而言。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは、ただ自分のコントロールを超えた力で遊ぶのが好きなだけだ、すべてはその哀れな短い人生を延長するためだけだ。それなりに感動すると言ってやってもいいだろう」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは、ただ自分のコントロールを超えた力で遊ぶのが好きなだけだ、すべてはその哀れな短い人生を延長するためだけだ。それなりに感動すると言ってやってもいいだろう」

languages.text: «A los mon-keigh les encanta jugar con fuerzas que escapan a su control, y todo en aras de prolongar sus patéticamente cortas vidas. Incluso diría que me parece... conmovedor, en cierto modo».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."

traits.locale_text: «A los mon-keigh les encanta jugar con fuerzas que escapan a su control, y todo en aras de prolongar sus patéticamente cortas vidas. Incluso diría que me parece... conmovedor, en cierto modo».

languages.text: "Mon-keighler, acınası küçük ömürlerini uzatmak adına kontrol edemeyecekleri güçlerle oynamayı çok seviyor. Bu durumun kendi özelinde... Dokunaklı sayılabileceğini söylemeliyim."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler, acınası küçük ömürlerini uzatmak adına kontrol edemeyecekleri güçlerle oynamayı çok seviyor. Bu durumun kendi özelinde... Dokunaklı sayılabileceğini söylemeliyim."

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh adorent jouer avec des forces qui les dépassent dans le but d'allonger leurs misérables petites existences. Je dirais même que c'est... touchant, d'une certaine manière. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh adorent jouer avec des forces qui les dépassent dans le but d'allonger leurs misérables petites existences. Je dirais même que c'est... touchant, d'une certaine manière. »

languages.text: "Chem-Pan-Sey spielen einfach gerne mit Kräften außerhalb ihrer Kontrolle, nur um ihre lächerlich kurze Lebenszeit zu verlängern. Ich finde das irgendwie ... berührend, auf eine ganz eigene Art."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh just love toying with forces beyond their control, all in the name of extending their pitiful little lifespan. I would even say it's... touching, in its own way."

traits.locale_text: "Chem-Pan-Sey spielen einfach gerne mit Kräften außerhalb ihrer Kontrolle, nur um ihre lächerlich kurze Lebenszeit zu verlängern. Ich finde das irgendwie ... berührend, auf eine ganz eigene Art."
